resources.string: Your ultimate destination for discovering movies, TV shows, and more.
Connect your TMDB account to access your watchlists and ratings.
If you have access to a Jellyseerr server, connect your account to request movies and TV shows instantly.

ScenePeek can open URLs from IMDb & TMDB in the app. This can be useful for opening links to movies, TV shows and person directly in the app.

To enable this, follow these steps:
1. Open the settings by pressing the button below.
2. Open by default or Set as default section.
3. Choose Open supported links for ScenePeek


(some devices have this listed under Default Apps in the main settings followed by selecting ScenePeek for relevant categories)

New in this version:
1. TMDB Lists - Create and edit custom lists, add movies and TV shows
2. Watchlist tab renamed to Profile, now includes watchlists, lists, and ratings
